lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: My charity, ICA (International Charity for Africa) is supporting micro entrepreneurs in sub-Sahara Africa and I have seen, first hand, what a huge impact a tiny start-up loan (at low interest) can make in the lives of impoverished families and youth.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the administrator of this new organization, ICA, a  registered Canadian NGO  delivering poverty alleviation support through working with micro-enterpreneurs to strenghten their businesses so that they can begin to generate desparately needed employment for the millions of unemployed in Africa. At ICA, we know that when parents have meaningful economic activities and or jobs, they are able to take care of their children's basic needs-food,housing, education & health. This is the approach we are taking towards fighting poverty in sub-Sahara Africa.

Africa Matters is an organization that aims to raise awareness among the Lakehead University community about issues in Africa. We also intend to fundraise so that we can help support initiatives to improve the quality of life in Africa. Areas of focus are:
•	Health and the AIDS epidemic
•	Education
•	Women’s Issues
•	Poverty
•	Development

lenders.loan_because: I believe in a world where everybody has the same opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Economics Graduate Student at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem and a Project Manager in Intel corporation.

lenders.name: Leena
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place in whatever small way I can as I believe that everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Walter Sommergruber
lenders.loan_because: it's a way to make the world a better place

lenders.name: Genny
lenders.loan_because: This makes me smile
lenders.occupational_info:
In my defense, accountants aren't really boring people.
We just get excited over boring things.

lenders.name: Allan
lenders.loan_because: I'm good guy Allan

lenders.name: MamaB
lenders.occupation: Devoted to becomming a better human being
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good! As a mum to 5 beautiful people,  its really important to me to teach them by example how we need to help each other in life and through Kiva we have a fantastic opportunity to do just that.  It is especially inspiring to help people who are striving for better not through charity but by being given access to a loan that they will pay back with dignity and pride.  Its what I would hope for should I have found myself in that position.
lenders.occupational_info: Its constantly under review!

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to see my daughter grow up in a better world. And as the saying goes: "if opportunity doesn't knock, build a door." Or in this case help build a door.
lenders.occupational_info: Through my business I protect people from the financial impact of accidents, illness and other forms of misfortune.

lenders.name: Shaun, Chelsea & Rocco!
lenders.occupation: child care, barista, feeder and pooper
lenders.loan_because: the best way to make a better planet
lenders.occupational_info: easy

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It feels wonderful to be able to make a difference, however large or small, as well as to give opportunities to others, which I sometimes take for granted myself.

lenders.name: David W.
lenders.loan_because: Charity requires action.  The old adage give a man a fish and you've fed him for a day; Teach him to fish and you've fed him for a lifetime.  This is my way of teaching others to fish.  A  Christian principle.

lenders.name: Craig & Jillian
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us with resources we can share
lenders.occupational_info: Jillian is a secondry school Music Teacher and Craig is an ICT Project Manager

lenders.name: Hanneke
lenders.loan_because: I realise I was born in 'the right place', and my life is very easy compared to that of many others.
lenders.occupational_info: As a translator I am translating all sorts of documents and articles, it is Interesting and divers;  I learn something new every day

lenders.name: Ryan & Denice
lenders.loan_because: After 7 combined years of serving as Volunteers for AmeriCorps and Peace Corps, we finally have the financial means to be on the other side of fundraising for sustainable development.

lenders.name: Hempza Mawawa
lenders.loan_because: We would like to upgrade some of the equipment we use to teach kids arts & multimedia around South Africa...
lenders.occupational_info: We are running a youth upliftment organization in Soweto called the Native Hut Foundation. Teaching kids the importance of projecting in the own mother tounges, most of our network is developing alternative ways to get South African kids interested in the development of their life skills... check www.blacksundaysoweto or www.hempza.calabashmusic.com

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: Global karma is a powerful thing.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make web sites and computer programs user friendly.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.occupation: Low Income Tax Credit Housing Manager
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.  I am very thankful for the roof over my head, the fact that I have employment, and a support system of family and friends.  Having said that, I am also very aware that there are people all over the world that do not have those things and if I can give them aid in any form, I want to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: The company that I work for provides housing to low income tax credit families from Pennsylvania down to Georgia.  While I love working in this field, my goal is to one day work with those at a poverty level and provide housing assistance to those individuals.

lenders.name: 6th Hour Sociology
lenders.loan_because: we like helping people

lenders.name: Roni
lenders.loan_because: I need it for my bussines. I'm work with 3 of member in Bangbarung Galeri arts and decorations. In our home land, we just can make product depend to customer order. We can make a larger wing for my bussines. I hope with your loan we can make a better futures for our bussines and many poeple in our galery.
lenders.occupational_info: i work for crafts product, arts and artifical home industries.  and decorations for exibitions, wedding etc.

lenders.name: Kathrine
lenders.loan_because: I want women to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit inside a small office without much contact with other people and take information that is old and on paper and scan it into the computer to make the information more readily available to people in my company.

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: a little less will be more

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: Its just the right thing to do. My GF and I started our own small business 2 yrs ago with financial help from 2 good friends, we will be done repaying them in 4 months, so I think its now my turn to help others in the same manner, kinda like pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for an alternative school on a Native Reserve in Canada ( Tyendinaga Mohawk Territory ). I look after all the buildings maintenance and also the computer tech.

Also with my own store at home, Rez-Mart we sell Native crafts & convenience store stuff & tobacco products.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: Small businesses are needed to encourage growth. Many times there are no funds available for low income individuals to start or improve a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure the farmers are using their pesticides correctly and by the law and that their workers are trained about pesticide exposure.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: A small amount can create a whole lot of good.

lenders.name: owen
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital laboratory, where I perform a variety of blood tests, to help diagnose, moniter, and screen diseases.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: Someone out there needs the money more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I learn.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I hope it helps someone make a better life for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell electronics to  customers around the world.

lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student in high school.

lenders.occupational_info: Help companies achieve their best performance!

lenders.name: Velma

lenders.occupational_info: I am in an collabrative effort with EJ Foundation, Inc., for 9 month out of the year, my comestics business would like to help women in Tanzania, Kenya, Narobia become business owners and help provide basic everyday survival tools for orphanages.

lenders.name: The Collins Family
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed and because Kiva helps for the long term instead of putting a band-aid on the problem. I also admire Kiva loan recipients for asking for a helping hand not a hand out!

I want to make a difference.

lenders.loan_because: well, we talk about democracy as being the distribution of power. But that makes no sense when wealth ends up being pooled into the hands of a rich few. It's simple justice.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of British Columbia doing a joint programme in Law/ Masters of Asia Pacific Policy Studies. I want to go home to Singapore. I hope to do human development in Southeast Asia. One day.

lenders.name: Marian

lenders.occupational_info: I have the opportunity of getting to stay at home and take care of my son.

lenders.name: Dick & Ellie
lenders.loan_because: Life has been very good to us.  It is time to repay our good fortune and help the less fortunate.  I am a firm believer in the Credit Union idea of people helping people and KIVA is the closest to that ideal.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both retired but try to stay active.

lenders.name: Mariano
